comments.body:
Clarified subject to help search results.

Thanks for your contribution.

I also have an idea for this mob it would be a smaller warden like mob but this one would be passive but they would have a sculk sensor and would walk near the player and its head would alert the warden if you did any of the things to Triger the non living sculk sensor if it was in the game its name if not changed would be called sculk parasite

for mobs that can break torches I give you the shadow hand it would be a mod that you need the new food the glow berry but you know all about this new food but it would have a new use like the glowing from a spectral arrow if eaten you would get a new affect called shadow vision that lets you see them they would be a player looking mob that would be almost all black but would have a player head with glowing yellow eyes but can't kill the player it would just annoying and break your torches and steel them but like we all know when some thing annoys most players well ya it gets killed...

I have one for a new slime this slime will be called the Mud Slime. It is a light brown slime with dark brown sprinkled on it so it looks dirty. it also would dig after you if you are 30 blocks they would be small and the tunnel it made would in 1 scents fill so it can not be used by the player. this slime would spawn in the Swamps under grounded water caves and it you are with in 30 blocks of it it will follow you to try to kill you.

If you use a bottle on it you will get mud in a bottle and the advancement "it is a dirty job but some one has to do it. you can feed it using dirt to make it bigger. if there is lave it will dig arrowed it. this slime can also clime walls.

I have a new biome for you it is the Fringed Cave it is a vary cold cave that has powdered snow in it along with ice snow packed ice and a few new mobs.

 

The biome so this biome will spawn below y -60 so that it would be harder to get to for new players. it would have a new mob the snow creeper and it would look like snow and if it detonated its blast would be 10 blocks bigger then a normal ones blast would be so ya...

Here is a another mob this mob it called the Blerrr  it is a mob that you can tame with frost fish it would help by if it kills a mob it will be come a ice block with that mob in it and you can get that block with slick touch and use it in your builds.

The frost fish is a mob that will live in the little water that is in the biome you can also get it bye fishing in the biome.

The biome will also spawn strays but I think you knew that already.

I have a mob that would blend in too it I called Cave phantom with how big the caves are going to be I think we can have a flying cave mob that is not that bat now. so the cave phantom would be a stone texture above -60 but below -60 would be a deepslate  texture to blend in with it's surroundings this mob can only be killed with flame fire aspect or bane of Arthropods.

Don't think I for got the lava mob ether. so the mob I have for you is called the crisp a skeleton that well did not have such a good time near the geysers that will be in its new geode it is called laver geode it would look like a normal geode but this one would have 3 variants the steamer a geode that has black stone it is with magma block and steaming vents and is filled with water. The fire geode that would have are new mob it would also have the black stone but would not have and water and a lava geode a geode filled with lava with layer of black stone in it .
Do you mean this like breeding boar to become pigs? If not, this seems hard…
RulerofTwilight, yes that is what I mean. You take the wild variants (like the boar) and breed them until they eventually resemble and behave like the normal pigs that we have now.

YESSS! I suggested a very similar idea. Except I suggest that you have to lure baby versions of the wild animal, wait until they grow up and breed them. Then there would be a (slight) chance that it would become domesticated. Upvoted!
Could this be applied to other animals such as wolves/ dogs, ocelots/cats , parrots ect?

Yes! I think it would be cool if it was rideable and still kept that leaves/wheat destroying feature, maybe have it have a bit less health (maybe 50 instead of 100?). Would be cool if it still attacked in tandum with you though, like if you ride one and attack a mob or player in front of you the Ravager will also attack that enemy.
I think it should just look like a ravager but have similar riding mechanics to a horse

can we have a ravager that can be tamed?And this should not be called a ravager, but instead it should be called a bull.It should also be able to haul items and hoe farms in a 3x3 block square! perfect for huge farms!
I think the potion should be something to do with flying like a flying potion that is like creative flight and not like levitation
Name Tags are used to name a mob and that's it. It doesn't give the ability to tame a mob.
Taming the Ender Dragon is a big no. Also why would you tame the ender dragon when the end portal is closed? You would be stuck there forever.
AND with the endermen. Also, you can't name the ender dragon in the first place.
Maybe you can craft them with iron ingots and paper.
Good idea! Maybe skeletons, strays and wither skeletons should find an unmounted spider or cave spider and mount it.

No Cave Spider.
Cave Spider is small.
Normal Spider is good size.
I think this is a nice idea, I just wonder how it would work.
Well, how about a respawn anchor for pets? It seems very simple. Instead of using glowstone, maybe you use purpur or some other end material.
We're already adding foxes, but remember to keep your requests to one main idea per topic, thanks! :)
this could be a new extension to the nether update, where pigs turn into zombified pigs (zigs) when transportedinto the nether.

pig > zig
hoglin > zoglin
piglin > zombified piglin
Seems interesting.
Yeah! And maybe some eggs recipes, i mean we could make fried eggs on a pen.

I suppose I should clarify things I think could help this issue (One of my first posts so I forgot how this is supposed to work).
A few things that could be done, and these are just ideas, are

1. Increase the amount of time you have before you have to sleep again to get rid of the phantoms (but this would only really help in realms).

2. Reduce spawning of phantoms when in multiplayer servers to stop them from constantly respawning every night so you only have to kill them once per rest. This would be a better option for both servers and realms.

3. Just get rid of them entirely in realms and servers or at the very least include an option to stop them specifically from spawning in servers and realms.

That's all I got but if anyone else has any ideas I highly encourage you to put them as a comment.

You don't actually have to skip the night to keep phantoms from attacking you, you just have to get in the bed.  Removing them from multiplayer would not be good because then there would be no way to brew potions of slow falling.

everyone needs to vote for this, Phantoms are outrageous in servers. Sometimes I wonder why they even got added in the first place they are very annoying in a 100 plus survival server and no one, and I mean no one sleeps.

Phantoms should be neutral, only attacking the people who have a high insomnia rating, that way, if your friend is in the nether/end, or just doesn't sleep (ever) you don't get punished for skipping just one night.
Witches currently are very stupid. They use healing potions against undead mobs and don’t have milk to protect themselves from potions
You are thinking of the whomping willow from Harry Potter. Weeping willow is the real life tree.
Who doesnt want a pet zombie cat?
I love cats SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!! MUCH so add those pls zombiefied cats would be soo cool pls pls pls pls add those!!!
Cool.
Thank you all for your votes. Like and Share so we can get more votes.
Nether needs to be harder, so yes!
I love this
I guess your idea is confirm that you can riding a ghast
they only took 7 years

Zombie pillagers would be nice because the zombies would help us kill the pillagers but the zombie would still kill us though and the pillager's crossbow would disappear when they turn into zombie pillagers. It is desgined to kill us, villagers, iron golems and snow golems. This should be for PC, PE, Java and Bedrock
I partially support this idea.  If it were implemented, woodland mansions would have to have to be swarming with illagers, but devoid of hostile mobs.

Came here to make the same post. 

As for woodland mansions, I think they should be revamped to be a spawning area for pillagers, but only in darkness, so if you light up the mansion they won't spawn.
I don't think pillagers would fit in the mansion, maybe the unused illusioner
i 100% support this idea!
Well rabbits in real life are not that dumb and the fact that rabbits breed like crazy isnt true.
Blazes?  When they are spawned in lava, they sink into it, and when a player gets close enough, they levitate out of the lava and pepper the player with fireballs.
How about they don't shoot a fireball, but are on fire, leave a fire trail behind them, and inflict burning on hit. Plus make them spawn from zombie pigmen the same way Drowned spawn from zombies.
They should be called either the Burned or the Banished, like from the Nether Explorers skin pack
I think the wooly cow from Minecraft dungeons would be a good version of the cow it would be another source of wool u could find them where goats spawn
I think the wooly cow from Minecraft dungeons would be a good version of the cow it would be another source of wool u could find them where goats spawn
Yes, this does sound cool.
Love this idea, especially with the new snapshot finally adding baby squid and dolphins to Java Edition. Having a squid in a bucket would be great.
Great idea! I love how you explained how everything would play out and the behavior of this mob I am voting!
ı approve this idea, they should be big as sniffers and there should be calves too :)
Could even call them wyverns to differentiate them from the ender dragon
